name: Mitigation Playbook for Phishing Attack - Data Exfiltration
description: This playbook mitigates unauthorized access and data exfiltration following a phishing attack which allowed attackers to execute malicious scripts.

action--324dbe47-8578-46f1-bb94-c8d3cd4c.name: Kill the malicious script process
action--324dbe47-8578-46f1-bb94-c8d3cd4c.description: Terminate the process executing the malicious script.

if-condition--d887e076-f905-4eee-b90a-4d.name: Check if malicious script process still running

action--d887e076-f905-4eee-b90a-4d4f7e3b.name: Isolate the affected host from the network
action--d887e076-f905-4eee-b90a-4d4f7e3b.description: Disable network interfaces on the compromised host to prevent further access.

action--e65d81a5-2fff-46b8-b4d6-70e5a9ba.name: Perform a full system scan for malware
action--e65d81a5-2fff-46b8-b4d6-70e5a9ba.description: Scan the entire system for any malware.

while-condition--repeat_scan.name: Repeat scan until system is clean

action--12734549-b9b5-4431-a6fa-b9d3f36e.name: Change all compromised account passwords
action--12734549-b9b5-4431-a6fa-b9d3f36e.description: Log action to change passwords for accounts that may have been compromised.

action--0fdb2219-e21e-4eca-b4ff-684c6897.name: Monitor external data leaks from affected user
action--0fdb2219-e21e-4eca-b4ff-684c6897.description: Continuously monitor for any exfiltration logs to identify additional data exfiltration.

exfiltration_log.description: Path to the log file that records data exfiltration
